name: The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring
name_original: The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring
description:
The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring is a strategy game developed by Liquid Entertainment. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Vivendi Universal Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring on PC.
Ed Kaminski produced the game. Edward Alexander Del Castillo directed the game. It was scored by Lennie Moore.
